Headline: Blue Line Service Delayed at Grand
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are standing at Grand due to an unauthorized person on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are standing at Grand due to an unauthorized person on the tracks.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines. 

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
